name: B3313
overview:
B3313 is a ROM Hack created by Christopher Rios Lillo, that has you explore the castle's internal plexus.

You start out playing, what looks to be the Super Mario 64 Beta, but as you explore deeper into the castle, it becomes mazelike and warped as you start finding dark secrets and mysteries around the castle.

You might even encounter the infamous personalization AI...

Can you solve the mystery of the anomalous Super Mario 64 Beta?
